mapper.insert: insert into user_table( user_num, user_name, user_mail, user_pw, user_call, postcode, user_address )values( user_num_seq.nextval, #{userName }, #{userMail }, #{userPw }, #{userCall }, #{postcode }, #{userAddress } )
mapper.select: select user_num as userNum, user_name as userName, user_mail as userMail, user_call as userCall, authority as role from user_table where user_mail = #{userMail }

select rpad( substr(substr(user_mail, 1, instr(user_mail, '@') - 1), 1, 2), lengthb(substr(user_mail, 1, instr(user_mail, '@') - 1)), '*') || '@' || rpad( substr(substr(user_mail, instr(user_mail, '@') + 1), 1, 2), lengthb(substr(user_mail, instr(user_mail, '@') + 1)), '*') as userMail from user_table where user_name = #{userName } and user_call = #{userCall }
select user_mail as userMail from user_table where user_mail = #{userMail }

select user_name as userName, user_mail as userMail, user_call as userCall, postcode as postcode, substr(user_address, 1, instr(user_address, '_') - 1) as userAddress, substr(user_address, instr(user_address, '_') + 1) as role from user_table where user_mail = #{userMail }
mapper.update: update user_table set user_call = #{userCall }, postcode = #{postcode }, user_address = #{userAddress } where user_mail = #{userMail }
